item1:
库位状态的查询
Query of storage shelf status
item2:
可查询库位状态及产品明细数据
Can query the status of the location and article details
item5:
库位信息的查询条件
Query conditions for location information
item7:
如果无符合条件的库位数据，系统将提示查无此库位信息
If there is no eligible location data, the system will prompt you to find no such location information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Loc. No后点选Query查询库位数据
Enter query conditions or select Loc. No and click Query to query the location data
